Female01_Hands_ring_01_desc
A ring embedded with an elegant, olive-green peridot stone worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness of 7)[#Legal]
Une bague sertie d'un cristal de péridot vert-olive portée au majeur de la main droite. (7 sur l'échelle de dureté de Mohs)[#Legal]
Ein Ring mit einem eingebetteten, eleganten olivgrünen Peridotstein, der am Mittelfinger der rechten Hand getragen wird. (Mohs Stärke 7)[#Legal]
Anello con un'elegante pietra di crisolito color verde oliva incastonata, da portare al dito medio della mano destra. (durezza scala di Mohs: 7)[#Legal]
Un anillo con una elegante piedra de peridoto verde oliva incrustada que se coloca en el dedo corazón de la mano derecha. (Dureza en escala de Mohs, 7).[#Legal]
右手の中指に輝く、爽やかな黄緑色をしたペリドットの指輪。（モース硬度７）[#Legal]
오른손의 중지에서 아름답게 빛나는 상쾌한 황녹색 페리도트 반지.(모스 경도 7)[#Legal]
A bright olive peridot ring glittering on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness = 7)[#Legal]
戴在右手中指，感覺清爽的橄欖石戒指。（莫氏硬度7）[#Legal]
戴在右手中指，感覺清爽的橄欖石戒指。（莫氏硬度7）[#Legal]
A ring embedded with an elegant, olive-green peridot stone worn on the middle finger of the right hand. (Mohs hardness of 7)[#Legal]
